description: Details required by Condition 9 and 13 (ecology enhancement report) of permission 23/01699/FUL (Erection of a three storey residential building housing 5nos. new dwellings with associated cycle and bin access.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided to enhance and safeguard the biodiversity and nature conservation value of the site, as is required by Conditions 9 and 13, in conflict with policy G6 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS3 and DM6 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
